synonyms: caturthe—in the Fourth Chapter; kahiluṅ—I have described; janmera—of His birth; mūla—the real; prayojana—necessity; sva-mādhurya—His own transcendental sweetness; prema-ānanda—of ecstatic joy from love; rasa—the mellows; āsvādana—tasting.
translation: The Fourth Chapter describes the main reason for His appearance, which is to taste the mellows of His own transcendental loving service and His own sweetness.
